definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

pinyin: dian4 lan3 tiao2 zhi4 jie3 tiao2 qi4

sentences.english: Demodulation performance of OFDM systems can be improved after CFO is compensated.
sentences.chinese: 将跟踪到的频偏补偿后，提高了系统解调性能。

sentences.english: Then dialin to the modem again.
sentences.chinese: 然后再次拨入调制解调器。

sentences.english: The main specifications of this demodulator surpass to the design target.
sentences.chinese: 该解调器的主要性能指标均超过了课题的设计要求。

sentences.english: A receiver demodulates the carrier signal that arrives from its antenna.
sentences.chinese: 接收器解调变到达它的天线的载波讯号。

sentences.english: The design scheme of a new CATV signal multiple demodulator is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种新型CATV信号多路解调器的设计方案。

sentences.english: FPLL (Frequency and Phase Locked Loop) is a new kind of threshold extended demodulator for satellite TV receivers.
sentences.chinese: FPLL是一种新型卫星电视门限扩展解调器。

sentences.english: A Morlet -like wavelet clusterbased method for bandpass filtering and envelope demodulation is described.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于小波簇的带通滤波和包络解调新方法。

sentences.english: A method of automatic detection of line-spectrum in DEMON (Detection of Envelope Modulation on Noise) spectra is given.
sentences.chinese: 给出了一种自动检测解调谱线谱的方法。

sentences.english: The tuner is for QAM demodulation and error-correcting decoding functions.
sentences.chinese: 其中，QAM解调和解码功能由一体化高频头来实现。
你的调制解调器够快吗？

sentences.english: Select a bonded Bluetooth phone to use as a dialup modem.
sentences.chinese: 请选择绑定的蓝牙电话用作拨号调制解调器。

sentences.english: This demodulation method can also be applied to other DPSK signal.
sentences.chinese: 这种解调方法也可以应用于其它类型的DPSK信号。

sentences.english: Demodulator is a device for assembling signals after they have been received by an antenna.
sentences.chinese: 解调器是对被天线接受到的信号进行聚集处理的设置。

sentences.english: To avoid these disadvantages, an all-digital demodulator scheme is given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 针对上述缺点本文给出一种全数字解调器方案。

sentences.english: Research on Dynamic Demodulating Technique for Fiber Grating Sensor System.
sentences.chinese: 一种光纤布拉格光栅动态解调系统的研究。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
harmonious/to adjust/to tune (e.g. wireless receiver)/to bring into harmony
